successful partnerships in entertainment history. "I didn't steal anything. I just made a new show as he made new shows," Simon Cowell said while sipping ginger tea and dragging on Kool cigarettes. At the point when Idol was launched, we both needed each other... I couldn't have done it without him, and I don't think he could have done it without me. But we both are people who like running our own businesses... It's been bizarre. Yet nothing, surely, was more bizarre than the process by which Simon Cowell , a behind-the-scenes record exec who professed he was "obsessed with getting rich," was transformed into an international television star.
